MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA15 area of Greenock, affecting properties in Holmscroft Street and surrounding areas. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11:15am due to a fault with our equipment outside 85 Holmscroft Street and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:58am on Sunday, 03 January 2021
